text:
Jof Davies has architected multi-system solutions combining AV engineering, automation, cloud storage, CRM integration, and data processing. Key architectural competencies include:

- Distributed ingest workflows across QNAP, Dropbox, and AWS Glacier.
- Multi-step automation pipelines involving Zapier, Monday.com, Google Sheets, and Webhooks.
- Email marketing infrastructures capable of handling ~1 million emails monthly.
- CRM ecosystems linking FiveCRM, HubSpot, and Genie.AI.
- Distributed remote editing architecture enabling 20+ editors worldwide.
- API-driven systems for content publishing, scraping, and data cleanup.

Jof integrates diverse technologies into cohesive, scalable systems that reduce cost and operational load.
